sensorAnalysis.title: Sensor Analysis
sensorAnalysis.instruction1: Press the sensor to your skin
sensorAnalysis.instruction2: While holding the sensor to your skin, click "Scan"
sensorAnalysis.instruction3: Hold it there until you see the checkmark

rescanPopup.title: Rescan Required
rescanPopup.text: Please, press the sensor to your skin again and click 'Scan' to ensure accurate results.

results.title: Your Top Matches
results.qrCodeInstructions: Scan the QR code & get results on your phone

cameraAnalysis.resultsSubtitle: Your photo has been captured successfully with facial landmarks detected.

grabTheSensor.title: Skin color analysis
grabTheSensor.subtitle: Grab the sensor
grabTheSensor.explanation: The skin scanning sensor is located on the left side of this screen. You’ll need it for the next step :)

leaveTheSensor.title: Skin color analysis
leaveTheSensor.text: Now put the sensor back to the holder
leaveTheSensor.subtitle: Return the sensor
leaveTheSensor.explanation: You don't need the sensor any more. You can leave it back to the holder :)

scanningWarnings.title: Skin color analysis
scanningWarnings.text: To get accurate results, avoid scanning:

faceDetection.title: Face Detection
faceDetection.lookingAtCameraAuto: Looking at camera - Keep looking to start countdown!
faceDetection.lookingAtCameraManual: Looking at camera - Auto capture disabled
faceDetection.lookDirectly: Please look directly at the camera
faceDetection.positionFace: Position your face in the camera
faceDetection.instructions: Look directly at the camera. The system will automatically detect when you're looking and take a photo after a 3-second countdown.

voting.title: Which Look Do You Prefer?
voting.instruction1: These <bold>AI-generated</bold> example models help us track <bold>makeup trends</bold>.
voting.instruction2: They are not real people, and they are never based on your photo.
voting.instruction3: Pick the look you like best!

welcome.title: Welcome to the Voting!
welcome.text: Help us improve by voting on AI generated images. Voting is quick and fun!
welcome.privacyNotice: Your anonymous votes help train our AI to better understand makeup preferences. No personal data is collected.

exit.title: Thank You for Voting!
exit.text: Your feedback helps us improve our makeup suggestions. We appreciate your time and contribution!
exit.question: Would you like to continue voting or exit?

feedback.title: Help us improve!
feedback.text: How would you rate your experience?

improvement.title: Tell us what could be improved

bundle.title: Your personalised perfect Look!
bundle.text: Explore the products that could go well with it.
